mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ruleset (name, description, project_id, members, created_by, created) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{projectId}, #{members,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ArrayTypeHandler}, #{createdBy}, now());
mapper.update: UPDATE ruleset SET name=#{name}, description=#{description}, project_id=#{project_id}, members=#{members,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ArrayTypeHandler}, modified=now() WHERE id = #{id} AND DELETED IS NULL
UPDATE ruleset SET deleted = now(), deleted_by = #{username} WHERE id = #{id} AND DELETED IS NULL
